name: Too Much! (LenzKleiser)
description:
Do you ever feel overwhelmed by too much affection? I know, happens to me all the time too! Don’t worry, I have just the right game for you. Slap your obnoxious punter away before they can reach your heart and trap it forever.

Controls

You are motion tracked via camera and hit the opponent by moving over them (with e.g your hand). Press ‘Space’ to see the motion image. You have 3 lives. Green outlined opponents trigger double points.

Install

This game needs to be played in the Processing environment. Therefore you need Processing on your computer to execute the game.

System Requirements!

The Camera Capture doesn’t work with Processing 3.x and macOS 10.14 (Mojave) and newer due to security issues! If you’re on a Mac, you could download the Processing 4.x alpha and play it. You should have no problems on a Windows.
